name: DJ Luck & MC Neat
description: '''DJ Luck & MC Neat''' are a British musical duo, composed of '''Joel Samuels''' (a.k.a. DJ Luck) and '''Michael Rose''' (a.k.a. MC Neat) mainly performing a combination of [[house music]] and [[UK garage]]. They had three consecutive [[Top 40|top 10]] hits in the United Kingdom from 1999 to 2000.
